# Tanglewood
## Overview
**Tanglewood:** This augmentation can only be added to walls of wood or living wood. The wall animates and *entangles* (as the *[[Entangle (Spell)|entangle]]* spell) anyone approaching within 5 feet of the outside of a tanglewood wall.

*Caster Level:* 5th; *Prerequisites:* [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Entangle (Spell)|entangle]]; Market Price:* 2,500 gp.
